locations.name: Innis Dorm Room
locations.brief_description:
You are in your Innis dorm room where you keep your dead laptop. But, it needs your misplaced 
laptop charger, USB drive, and your lucky mug. Find them before it’s too late and 
come back to submit your project. To your east is Robarts Commons.
locations.long_description:
You are in your dorm room about to submit your first-year CS project, but in your sleep-deprived 
state you didn’t realize that you are missing some key items. Your USB drive (the only 
copy of your game, because of course you forgot to back it up), your 
laptop charger (your battery was at 5% when you sat down), and—worst of all—your 
lucky U of T mug. You need to find them before the deadline. You pick up your TCard on 
the desk, probably need that. You also see something shiny on the ground -- looks like a toonie? 
To your east is Robarts Commons.
locations.post_item_grab_description:
You are in your Innis dorm room where you keep your dead laptop. But, it needs your misplaced 
laptop charger, USB drive, and your lucky mug. Find them before it’s too late and come back 
to submit your project. To your east is Robarts Commons.

locations.name: Bahen 1F
locations.brief_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. There are elevators to the West, and an exit from the building to St. George street to the East. You see something shiny on the ground -- looks like a toonie?
locations.long_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. It's usually crowded at this time of the day, but today it's eerily quiet. Only a few students are studying at the table near the doors. You better not disturb them. One student is rushing down the corridor, wearing a heavy-looking backpack and carrying a textbook in their arms. There are elevators to the West, and an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.

items.name: usb drive
items.description: Your project's USB drive containing the only copy of your game.

items.name: laptop charger
items.description: Oh dear, your laptop battery is low. Use the charger to power it back up.

items.name: lucky mug
items.description: A shiny blue UofT mug and your only prized possession.

items.name: loonie
items.description: A loonie from the Rotman student. What a scammer.

items.name: quarter
items.description: A quarter from the Rotman student. What a scammer.

items.name: toonie
items.description: There is a toonie on the ground. Someone must have dropped it.

items.name: chocolate bar
items.description: A delicious chocolate bar. I wonder if anyone's hungry.

items.name: janitor closet key
items.description: The only copy of the key to get into the janitor's closet.

items.name: cipher message item
items.description: An old piece of paper with some scribbled writing. I wonder who left it there.

items.name: gum
items.description: A piece of chewed gum. Ewww... but it could be useful with a ruler.

items.name: ruler
items.description: A strong durable ruler. It seems like it would work well to pry up heavy objects.
